This [93mstudy[0m [93mprovides[0m a [93mnew[0m [93mstrategy[0m for [93mdeveloping[0m [93mroom[0m-[93mtemperature[0m [93mhigh[0m-[93mperformance[0m [93mgas[0m [93msensors[0m, [93mshowing[0m [93msignificant[0m [93mapplication[0m [93mpotential[0m in [93mfood[0m [93mquality[0m [93mcontrol[0m, [93mpublic[0m [93mhealth[0m [93mprotection[0m, and [93menvironmental[0m [93msafety[0m [93mfields[0m.
- The [93minfluence[0m of a [93mmagnetic[0m [93mfield[0m on the [93mthermal[0m [93mdiffusion[0m of [93mpolyatomic[0m [93mgas[0m-[93mnoble[0m [93mgas[0m [93mmixtures[0m
- [93mCopper[0m-[93mCobalt[0m-[93mSulfide[0m and [93mCu[0m-[93mMOF[0m [93mNanoflower[0m [93mComposite[0m on [93mCopper[0m [93mFoam[0m: [93mHighly[0m [93mEfficient[0m [93mBifunctional[0m [93mCatalysis[0m for [93mLow[0m-[93mBarrier[0m [93mOverall[0m [93mWater[0m [93mSplitting[0m.: The [93mincreasing[0m [93mdemand[0m for [93mclean[0m [93menergy[0m [93mhas[0m [93mcatalyzed[0m [93msignificant[0m [93mresearch[0m into [93melectrochemical[0m [93mwater[0m [93msplitting[0m for [93mhydrogen[0m [93mproduction[0m. [93mHowever[0m, the [93mintrinsically[0m [93mslow[0m [93mkinetics[0m of the [93mhydrogen[0m [93mevolution[0m [93mreaction[0m ([93mHER[0m) and [93moxygen[0m [93mevolution[0m [93mreaction[0m ([93mOER[0m) [93mnecessitate[0m the [93mdevelopment[0m of [93mefficient[0m and [93mcost[0m-[93meffective[0m [93melectrocatalysts[0m. In this [93mstudy[0m, [93mCu[0m-[93mMOF[0m [93marrays[0m are [93mfirst[0m [93mgrown[0m on [93mcopper[0m [93mfoam[0m and then [93mpartially[0m [93mtransformed[0m [93mthem[0m into [93mcopper[0m-[93mcobalt[0m [93msulfide[0m through [93mvulcanization[0m, [93myielding[0m a [93mheterogeneous[0m [93mcomposite[0m [93mcatalyst[0m ([93mCu[0m-[93mCo[0m-[93mS[0m@[93mCu[0m-[93mMOF[0m/[93mCF[0m). The [93mresulting[0m [93mhierarchical[0m [93mnanoflower[0m [92marchitecture[0m [93meffectively[0m [93mmaximizes[0m the [93mexposure[0m of [93mactive[0m [93msites[0m while [93mconcurrently[0m [93mpromoting[0m [93melectrolyte[0m [93mdiffusion[0m and [93mfacilitating[0m [93mgas[0m [93mrelease[0m. [93mMore[0m [93mimportantly[0m, the [93msynergistic[0m [93meffects[0m of [93mcopper[0m [93mincorporation[0m and [93mstrong[0m [93minterfacial[0m [93mcoupling[0m between [93mCu[0m-[93mCo[0m-[93mS[0m and [93mCu[0m-[93mMOF[0m [93mprecisely[0m [93mmodulate[0m the [93melectronic[0m [93mconfiguration[0m of [93mcobalt[0m [93mactive[0m [93msites[0m. The [93moptimized[0m [93mcatalyst[0m [93mexhibits[0m [93moutstanding[0m [93mperformance[0m, [93machieving[0m [93moverpotentials[0m of just [93m72[0m [93mmV[0m for [93mHER[0m and [93m136[0m [93mmV[0m for [93mOER[0m at [93m10[0m [93mmA[0m [93mcm[0m -[93m2[0m . [93mRemarkably[0m, for [93moverall[0m [93mwater[0m [93msplitting[0m, it [93mrequires[0m only [93m1[0m.[93m48[0m [93mV[0m to [93mdrive[0m the [93msame[0m [93mcurrent[0m [93mdensity[0m while [93mmaintaining[0m [93mstability[0m for over [93m100[0m [93mh[0m-[93msurpassing[0m the [93mperformance[0m of [93mmost[0m [93mnon[0m-[93mnoble[0m [93mmetal[0m [93mcatalysts[0m [93mreported[0m to [93mdate[0m.
